comments.comment: Ever since you joined our weekend walking social group, your step count has been steadily increasing!
I’ve noticed your average daily steps have increased since you said you started walking to the market.
Thanks for taking care of our dog last weekend, I can tell you two went on lots of walks—your step count really shot up those two days!
Great Improvement in your consistency over the last month. I think we should start to discuss increasing your step count goal in our next meeting.
It looks like November is going to be your best month yet! I think changing your balance exercises has really made a positive impact.
I'm impressed with your progress over the last three months! It looks like all the spring gardening you've been doing has really made a difference.
